The integrated Trade, Logistics and Industrial Hub of Abu Dhabi

Enabling trade and industrial investments by leveraging the Integrated services of KIZAD with Khalifa Port.

Read More
  • About kizad
  • Benifits
  • Products
  • Business Partners
  • Know More
  • Enabling Sustainability
  • FAQ

Khalifa Industrial Zone Abu Dhabi [KIZAD], a subsidiary of Abu Dhabi Ports, is the largest industrial and free trade zone in the MENA region and offers the most competitive business setup solutions and world-class infrastructure facilities in the UAE.

Let’s talk

At KIZAD we’re here to listen, support and deliver. To find out more about the opportunities at KIZAD for your business growth in the region or to arrange a visit please contact our customer service centre.

Get in Touch

Need our help?

If you are already a customer of KIZAD and need our support or require information to support your business please contact our customer service centre here.

Contact Us

What our ecosystem offers

Scale

Wide range of business facilities and future-ready development enable investors to increase their scale of operations in phases - from very small startups to mega projects.

Wide range of business facilities and future-ready development enable investors to increase their scale of operations in phases - from very small startups to mega projects.

Strategic Location

Strategically located between Abu Dhabi and Dubai, the two most important economic centres of the region, KIZAD has an exceptional location and is ideally positioned to serve the key consumption markets in the GCC, Middle East and Africa.

Read more

Abu Dhabi

At the centre of trade between Europe, Asia and Africa, Abu Dhabi, the capital of the UAE, is a thriving business and lifestyle hub. Distinctive Arabian hospitality and rich culture, blended with a cosmopolitan and modern lifestyle, make Abu Dhabi an attractive and comfortable city to work and live.

Explore

INDUSTRIAL CLUSTERS

Spread over 410 km2, KIZAD is home to over 600 companies across industries including Food, Polymers, Metals, Automotive, Energy & Logistics.

Metals
Polyers
Energy
Food
Automotive
Oil & Gas
Logistics

Metals

KIZAD Metals Cluster is a dedicated zone for the regional and global upstream and downstream metals industry looking to take advantage of highly competitive utility costs, proximity to raw materials and excellent infrastructure and transportation links supporting the industry.

Read more

Polyers

KIZAD Metals Cluster is a dedicated zone for the regional and global upstream and downstream metals industry looking to take advantage of highly competitive utility costs, proximity to raw materials and excellent infrastructure and transportation links supporting the industry.

Read more

Energy

KIZAD Metals Cluster is a dedicated zone for the regional and global upstream and downstream metals industry looking to take advantage of highly competitive utility costs, proximity to raw materials and excellent infrastructure and transportation links supporting the industry.

Read more

Food

KIZAD Metals Cluster is a dedicated zone for the regional and global upstream and downstream metals industry looking to take advantage of highly competitive utility costs, proximity to raw materials and excellent infrastructure and transportation links supporting the industry.

Read more

Read more

Oil & Gas

KIZAD Metals Cluster is a dedicated zone for the regional and global upstream and downstream metals industry looking to take advantage of highly competitive utility costs, proximity to raw materials and excellent infrastructure and transportation links supporting the industry.

Read more

Logistics

KIZAD Metals Cluster is a dedicated zone for the regional and global upstream and downstream metals industry looking to take advantage of highly competitive utility costs, proximity to raw materials and excellent infrastructure and transportation links supporting the industry.

Read more

Business facilities

KIZAD offers a world-class infrastructure and business ecosystem. From industry innovations driving operational efficiency, reliable utilities infrastructure, waste management, internal transport network, advanced laboratory testing services and essential products and services in the value chain to provide businesses a significant advantage.

Read more

Free zone

KIZAD offers both Free Zone and Domestic Economic Zone facilities for investors, who can choose their facilities based on their business strategy and requirements. Whether you are a small start-up or an established large-scale business, KIZAD can offer customised business facilities spread across its Free Zone and Domestic Tariff Areas.

Read more

Learn more about kizad

Sustainability

Enabling a sustainable economy…

Our goal is to establish economies that are economically viable, environmentally sound and socially responsible.

Our Partners

Introduction
Abu Dhabi Ports Group
Abu Dhabi Ports is transforming Abu Dhabi’s maritime infrastructure, positioning the Emirate as a premier logistics, transport and trade hub through a diverse portfolio of services and activities. Through constant innovation, Abu Dhabi Port Group is going beyond being a port operator and developer, to be the preferred global trade enabler.
Read More
